We're encouraging everyone to make every drop count this summer with our #WatersWorthSaving campaign.

Why not make a start this #BankHoliday!

@Waterwise @EnvAgency @Ofwat @CCWvoice

South Korea is working to tackle food waste. In 1995 only 2% of food waste was recycled. That number is now up to 95%.  

We have so many solutions to reduce waste and lower emissions let's implement them.

#ActOnClimate #Useless #WasteLess #FoodWaste https://t.co/k6c0KW85jH

@KerrieDoodles @kiergroup @EnvAgency You would need a platoon of competent nest-finders to go through that lot with the proverbial tweezers. The term "ecologist" is very broad and I've met some shockers in my time.

Recent research shows that microplastics are swirling in the atmosphere around us, spiraling the globe in a cycle of pollution.
